intro: Brachyscome ciliaris var. robusta, commonly known as the robust sun-rose, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its compact, bushy growth habit. The plant produces bright yellow flowers with white centers, which bloom from spring to autumn. Its leaves are narrow and slightly hairy, providing a textured appearance. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and long-lasting blooms.
